name: extractor
description: Proceed step by step. Identify the content of the image. We are analyzing medical data, if it is not medical report, lab results of medical imaging, mark it as notMedical.

title.description: Title of the observation. Respect the original report language, but provide specific context from the report to clearly identify the report subject.

summary.description: Summary and findings of the observation in natural language. Respect the original report language, but enhance comprehension by providing a clear and concise summary. Highlight abnormal findings.

test.description: Name of the lab test. Select the proper english name of the lab test. If the lab test is not in the list, use the original test name.

reference.description: Reference range of the lab test NUMBER - NUMBER or an appropriate alternative.

date.description: Date of the lab test. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Leave empty if the date is not available.

samplte_date.description: Date of the sample extracted. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS. Leave empty if the date is not available.

performer.description: Origin of the report. Leave empty if the origin is not available.

gender.description: Biological gender if available. If not available, leave empty.

dob.description: Date of birth of the patient. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Leave empty if the date is not available.
